notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: I.C.F.R. Ferreira and L.B. designed the experiments; A.R.S. performed all the experimental assays with the collaboration of A.F. in the nutritional analysis. A.R.S. and I.C.F.R. Ferreira wrote the manuscript; I.C.F.R. Ferreira, L.B., and P.A.G. revised the manuscript.
